column4: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for investigation in Which - investigation Refused (Col. 4)
column5: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for investigation in Which - investigation Completed (Charge Found False/ Mistake of Fact or Law Etc.) (Col. 5)
column6: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for investigation in Which - investigation Completed (Final Report True Submitted) (Col. 6)
column7: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for investigation in Which - investigation Completed (Charge Sheets Submitted) (Col. 7)
column8: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for investigation in Which - investigation Completed (Total) (Col. 8) = Col. 5+6+7
column9: No. of Cases Pending investigation at the end of the year (Col. 9)

column2: SC/ST Prev. of Atrocities Act, 1989 for Scs
